artist: Painter: After Aegidius Sadeler II; Engraver: Peter de Jode, the Younger; Publisher: Jan Meyssens
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: ÆGIDIVS SADELER / eight lines of French: un de premiers ...mourut Ian 1629 / Ægedius Sadeler pinxit. Pet de Iode sculpsit   Io Meyssens execudit | on sheet in pencil: 2-351
portfolio: Image de divers hommes (1649); The true effiges of the most eminent Painters ... (1705)
title: Portrait of Ægidius Sadeler
